traits.name: Incorporeal
traits.detail: You can pass through any solid non-magical matter and cannot be hit by any non-magical weapon or attack.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.detail: Lutheria attacks twice with her claws.

actions.name: Claw
actions.detail: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ [attack] vs. AC. _Hit:_ [damage/2-0.5, d12] slashing damage.

actions.name: Vanish
actions.detail: Lutheria becomes invisible until she attacks or casts a spell.

actions.name: Blinding Darkness
actions.detail: A creature within 60' of Lutheria must make a DC 21 WIS save or become blinded (save ends).

actions.name: Nightmare Unleashed (recharge 5/6)
actions.detail: Lutheria briefly transforms into an indescribable horror. Two creatures within 60' of Lutheria that can see her must each make a DC 21 WIS save or take 15d6 psychic damage (half damage on save).
